Package org.apache.heron.examples.streamlet

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilesystemSinkTopology
    This topology demonstrates how sinks work in the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    FormattedOutputTopology
    This topology demonstrates the use of consume operations in the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    ImpressionsAndClicksTopology
    This topology demonstrates the use of join operations in the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    IntegerProcessingTopology
    This is a very simple topology that shows a series of streamlet operations on a source streamlet of random integers (between 1 and 10).
    RepartitionTopology
    This topology demonstrates the usage of a simple repartitioning algorithm using the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    SimplePulsarSourceTopology
    This topology demonstrates how sources work in the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    SmartWatchTopology
    This topology shows an example usage of a reduce function.
    StreamletCloneTopology
    This topology demonstrates clone operations on streamlets in the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    TransformsTopology
    In this topology, a supplier generates an indefinite series of random integers between 1 and 100.
    WindowedWordCountTopology
    This topology is an implementation of the classic word count example for the Heron Streamlet API for Java.
    WireRequestsTopology
    This topology demonstrates how different streamlets can be united into one using union operations.
